oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Volunteer Army Ammunition Plant, Panorama
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Military Service
TNT (Chemical)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of a field at the Volunteer Army Ammunition Plant with bunkers for TNT storage.
This photograph shows the storage facilities at the Volunteer Army Ammunition Plant for the TNT created there. Around 200 storage facilities were built on site.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Volunteer Army Ammunition Plant Photographs, 194- to 197-, Jeffrey W. Cash, Collector. Chattanooga Public Library
